pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Neutral$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Swamps.$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Agressive after you attack them.$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 40%% chance to drop 1 $(item)emerald$()

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Emerald Gators are allegators that spawn in the swamps of the world. While their appearance looks flashy, showing off the emeralds that their body contains, they are dangerous if you irritate them for long enough. So be careful!
